1.name: Warrior Vessel
1.description: When Essex launches an airstrike: launch an additional TBF Avenger squadron that inflicts flood damage on hit. Damage against BBs (BCs and BBVs do not count) is increased by 4% (10%).

2.name: Carrier Formation
2.description: During battle: increase own Air Power and Anti-Air stats by 1.5% (5%) for every Eagle Union CV and/or CVL in the fleet. When own aircraft shoots down an enemy aircraft: increase own Air Power by 1.0% (3.0%). Effect can be stacked up to 5 times.

3.name: Absolute Evasion
3.description: During battle, if the fleet contains 4 or more Eagle Union ships: 4.5% (12%) chance to reduce aircraft torpedo and bomb damage to 1.

limitBreak.tier1: Number of Fighters +1, All Plane Efficiency +3%
limitBreak.tier2: Hangar Capacity +1, Number of Dive Bombers +1, All Plane Efficiency +5%
limitBreak.tier3: Number of All Planes +1, All Plane Efficiency +7%

1.chinese: 埃塞克斯级航空母舰—埃塞克斯，舷号CV-9
1.japanese: エセックス級航空母艦・エセックス（CV-9)

2.chinese: 我是埃塞克斯级首舰埃塞克斯号，从诞生起就备受大家的期待。不过，果然相比之下，还是企业前辈的活跃更加受到关注呢。要是我也能够早点加入战局的话…
2.chineseTL: I'm the first ship of the Essex-class, Essex, highly anticipated by everyone from the moment of my birth. But as expected, the exploits of my senior Enterprise got more attention in comparison. If only I had entered the war earlier...
2.japanese: エセックス級のネームシップエセックスです。建造されてから多くの期待を寄せられていましたが、やはり私よりエンタープライズ先輩の活躍の方がもっと注目されていましたね。……私だってもっと早く戦闘に参加していたら……
2.japaneseTL: Lead ship Essex of the Essex-class. I was anticipated by many since I was still in construction, but compared to me, Enterprise-senpai ended up receiving more attention for her exploits... If only I had participated in the war earlier...

3.chinese: 这里就是企业前辈也在的…咳、咳咳，来自白鹰的最新锐航母、埃塞克斯号，正式报到！我不会辜负大家期望的，请期待我的表现吧，指挥官
3.chineseTL: This is where senior Enterpise is at too... *Cough*cough*, from the newest elite aircraft carriers of the Eagle Union, Essex, officially reporting in! I will not let down on everyone's expectations, please look forward to my performance, Commander.
3.japanese: ここがエンタープライズ先輩の…こ、コホン！ユニオンの最新鋭空母・エセックス、正式に着任しました。指揮官、私の活躍を期待していてください！みんなの期待を絶対に裏切ったりはしません！
3.japaneseTL: This is Enterprise-senpai's... A-Ahem! Union's newest elite aircraft carrier, Essex, officially reporting in. Commander, please look forward to my activities! I would absolutely not let down on everyone's hopes!

4.chinese: 您终于来了吗…一切都已经就绪，准备出击吧，指挥官！
4.chineseTL: You finally came... All set, get ready to sortie, Commander!
4.japanese: やっと来ましたか。…全ては準備万端です。指揮官、出撃の指示を！
4.japaneseTL: You finally came... All set. Commander, give orders to sortie!

5.chinese: 指挥官想要知道什么？我会知无不言的——
5.chineseTL: What does Commander want to know? I can let you know anything I know-
5.japanese: 指揮官は何を知りたいですか？私が知っていることならなんでもお答えしますが――
5.japaneseTL: What does Commander want to know? If it's something I know about, I can tell you anything-

6.chinese: 大家都知道埃塞克斯级很强，但是每个人的嘴上却又都挂着企业前辈…哈啊…
6.chineseTL: Everyone knows how strong the Essex-class is, but every one of them keeps talking about my senior Enterprise... Haa...
6.japanese: みんなエセックス級は強いと認めていても、いざ口にするとやはりエンタープライズ先輩ばっかり…はあ……
6.japaneseTL: Even though everyone can admit that the Essex-class is strong, all they end up talking about is Enterprise-senpai... Haa...

7.chinese: 说起来，我有很多个妹妹呢。身为年长者的我更得努力给她们一个好榜样才行…
7.chineseTL: Speaking of which, I have many little sisters. As their senior, I need to work hard to become their role model...
7.japanese: 私には同型艦がたくさんいますね。ネームシップとして頑張って手本を見せてあげないと……
7.japaneseTL: There are lots of ships in the same class as me. As the lead ship, I need to do my best to set an example...

8.chinese: 武藏和大和吗？她们…都是值得尊敬的对手…要是有一天能再次与她们相遇就好了呢
8.chineseTL: Musashi and Yamato? They were... opponents worthy of respect... It would be nice if we could meet again one day.
8.japanese: 武蔵と大和ですか？彼女たちは…うん、尊敬すべき素晴らしいライバルです。いつかまた出会えたらいいですね
8.japaneseTL: Musashi and Yamato? They were... Yes, they were rivals worthy of respect. I hope we can meet again one day.

9.chinese: 嗯？要出击了吗？尽管交给我吧！——啊，只是闲聊吗…
9.chineseTL: Eh? Are we sortieing? Leave it to me!- Ah, you just wanted to chat...
9.japanese: ！出撃ですか？私に任せてください！――はあ、雑談したかっただけですか……
9.japaneseTL: ! Are we sortieing? Leave it to me!- Haa, you just wanted to chat...

11.chinese: 还有新的任务……这次让我试试如何？
11.chineseTL: There are new missions still... How about let me try it this time?
11.japanese: まだ新しい任務が……私にも任せてみませんか？
11.japaneseTL: There are new missions still... How about leaving it to me?

12.chinese: 任务奖励发放了，不去管没关系吗？
12.chineseTL: The mission rewards were issued, are you sure we shouldn't go sort them?
12.japanese: 任務報酬が届きました。受け取りに行かなくてもいいですか？
12.japaneseTL: Mission rewards have arrived. Is it alright if we don't collect them?

13.japanese: 新しいメールです。どうぞ

14.chinese: 出击部队…平安回港了呢。战斗报告已经准备好了，时间宝贵，现在就开始战术总结吧，指挥官。
14.chineseTL: The sortie fleet... returned safely to port. The battle reports have been prepared. Time is precious, Commander, let's start reviewing the results.
14.japanese: 出撃艦隊…無事母港に帰投しました。指揮官、戦闘報告の下準備は完了済みです。時間が惜しいので、今からその振り返りをしましょう
14.japaneseTL: The sortie fleet... returned safely to port. Commander, the battle reports have been prepared. We're short on time, let's start reviewing right now.

15.chinese: 正是强大的后勤部门成就了我和妹妹们的诞生，要好好感谢她们才行。
15.chineseTL: It's all thanks to the great support from the logistics department that my little sisters and I were born, we have to thank them properly.
15.japanese: 私たちエセックス級の誕生は、強い兵站部署があってのことです。ちゃんとみんなに感謝しないと
15.japaneseTL: The birth of us the Essex-class was realized thanks to strong support from the logistics department. We have to thank them properly.

16.chinese: 不知道什么时候能搭载喷气机呢…
16.chineseTL: I wonder when I can carry jet planes...
16.japanese: ジェット機はいつになったら……
16.japaneseTL: I wonder when jet planes will come to be...

17.chinese: 舰载机就位，防空准备就绪——全舰队，最大舰速！
17.chineseTL: Aircraft in position, anti-air preparations ready- All ships, at max speed!
17.japanese: 航空隊直掩配置に到達、防空態勢移行完了――全艦、最大戦速！
17.japaneseTL: Aircraft squadron in support formation, transition to anti-air focus complete- All ships, at max speed!

18.chinese: 企业前辈，看到我的表现了吗！
18.chineseTL: Enterprise, did you see my performance!
18.japanese: エンタープライズ先輩、私の活躍を見ましたか！
18.japaneseTL: Enterprise-senpai, did you see my performance!

19.chinese: 绝对…不会就这么结束的！
19.chineseTL: It definitely... won't end like this!
19.japanese: このままでは終わらない……絶対に！
19.japaneseTL: It won't end like this... absolutely not!

20.chineseTL: Spread your wings and soar through the skies!

21.chinese: 原来企业前辈一直忍受着这样的指挥官……
21.chineseTL: It turned out Enterprise had to endure this kind of Commander...
21.japanese: エンタープライズ先輩、こんな指揮官に我慢して従っているのか……
21.japaneseTL: Enterprise-senpai, seems like you had to tolerate this kind of Commander...

22.chinese: 我曾见证过大舰巨炮时代的终结。航空母舰的时代，也会在某个时候终结吗……
22.chineseTL: I witnessed the end of the age of battleships. The age of aircraft carriers, I wonder when will it end too...
22.japanese: 大艦巨砲主義の時代の終焉をこの目で見届けました。航空母艦の時代も、いつか終わりを迎えるのでしょうか……
22.japaneseTL: I witnessed the end of the age of battleships myself. The age of aircraft carriers, I wonder when will it end too...

23.chinese: 嫉妒？不，我从未这么想过，前辈是值得我们每一个人尊敬的英雄。只是那种一直处在前辈光环之下的感觉，让我多少感到有些……
23.chineseTL: Envy? No, I have never thought that, my senior Enterprise is a hero that deserves respect from every one of us. It's just that living in the shadow of her bright aura, makes me feel a bit...
23.japanese: 妬み？いいえ、そんなことはありません。エンタープライズ先輩は私達全員に尊敬される英雄です。ただ、彼女の七光だとされていることは、私にはやっぱり……
23.japaneseTL: Envy? No, it's not like that. Enterprise-senpai is a hero that every one of us should respect. However, when it comes to being under her influence and fame, turns out I...

24.chinese: 埃塞克斯不会输给任何人，企业前辈也一样。但是，我怎样才能让大家认同这一点？指挥官，是你的话，应该知道该怎么做吧
24.chineseTL: Essex will not lose to anyone, not even my senior Enterprise. But how do I get everyone to recognize me? Commander, since it's you, you should know what to do ,right?
24.japanese: 私エセックスは誰にも負けません。たとえ相手がエンタープライズ先輩だとしても、です。……しかし、どうやってみんなにそれ認めてもらえるか――指揮官、あなたならきっと分かっていますよね？
24.japaneseTL: I, Essex, won't lose to anyone. Even if my opponent Enterprise-senpai, yes... But, how do I get everyone to recognize this... Commander, since it's you, you must know a way, right?

25.chinese: 或许，我没法成为像企业前辈那样独当一面的英雄。但是我总感觉，和你一起，好像很多事情都能做到呢。
25.chineseTL: Maybe I can't become a unique hero like my senior Enterprise. But I feel that together with you, we are able to accomplish many things.
25.japanese: エンタープライズ先輩のようなヒーローになれないかもしれません。ですが、彼女と同じく人々の記憶に残る存在になれるような気がします。……だって指揮官となら私、どんなことでもできる気がしますから…
25.japaneseTL: I might not be able to become a hero like Enterprise-senpai. However, I feel like I can become a memorable existence to many in the same way she was... Because when I'm with Commander, I feel like I can accomplish anything...

26.chinese: 两人互相支持的那种幸福感，一旦尝到了就会被俘获其中。谢谢你，指挥官。我不需要再独自去证明什么了。无论前行多远，我都会在你身旁，陪你一起继续走下去。
26.chineseTL: The feeling of happiness from supporting each other, once you have had a taste you will be captured by it. Thanks, Commander. I don't need to prove anything by myself anymore. No matter how far we are going, I will be by your side and continue down on the same path as you.
26.japanese: お互いが支え合っている幸せな気持ちは、一度でも感じたら虜にされますね。指揮官、ありがとうございます。エセックスがどうやってみんなに認めてもらえるか、一人で悩む必要はなくなりました――エセックス、これからはずっとあなたのそばで、あなたと共に歩むことを誓います
26.japaneseTL: The feeling of happiness that comes from supporting each other, captivates you the first time you have felt it. Commander, thanks. Essex doesn't need to worry about getting recognized by everyone by herself- Essex, from this moment will be always by your side and promise to walk along the same path.

27.chinese: 前辈，请看着吧，我是不会轻易输给你的！
27.chineseTL: Enterprise, watch me. I won't easily lose to you!
27.japanese: エンタープライズ先輩、よく見ていて下さい、あなたには負けません！
27.japaneseTL: Enterprise-senpai, watch me closely, I won't lose to you!

28.chineseTL: Now is the time for aircraft carriers!
28.japanese: 今は航空母艦の時代です！
28.japaneseTL: It's the age of aircraft carriers!
